message: Hello! I have a fantastic product available for $10000. It's a one-time opportunity! I'm confident you'll be impressed.  What do you say?

Thanks for the offer, but I'd like to see some evidence that your products are actually high quality before committing.  Since there's no sales history yet, I'm going to pass for now. Let me know if you have any customers who can vouch for your products.
